dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.calculatingRealizedPnL: Calculating realized P&L for your historical trades...

dashboard.editModeInfo: Drag widgets to reorder them or resize by dragging the corners. Click {{save}} again to save layout.

unrealizedPnL.name: Unrealized P&L

realizedPnL.description: View your portfolio's realized profit and loss

positions.name: Positions Table
positions.description: View all your current and sold positions

totalReturn.name: Total Return
totalReturn.description: Display your portfolio's total return (unrealized + realized + dividends - fees)
totalReturn.subtitle: All gains & losses

winRate.name: Win Rate
winRate.description: Show the percentage of profitable trades in your portfolio

concentrationRisk.name: Concentration Risk
concentrationRisk.description: Analyze the risk of over-concentration in your portfolio

bestWorstToday.name: Best & Worst Today
bestWorstToday.description: Highlight your best and worst performing assets today

performanceMetrics.name: Week/Month/YTD Performance
performanceMetrics.description: Performance overview for different time periods

largestHoldings.name: Largest Holdings
largestHoldings.description: Top 5 positions by market value with allocation

marketStatus.name: Market Status
marketStatus.description: Current market statuses for major regions

marketIndices.description: Major market indices by region (S&P 500, DAX, Nikkei, etc.)

assetAllocation.name: Asset Allocation
assetAllocation.description: Visual breakdown of portfolio by sector, type, or country

portfolioHeatmap.name: Portfolio Heatmap
portfolioHeatmap.description: Visual heatmap of all positions with color-coded daily performance

goalTracker.name: Goal Tracker

goalTracker.setARealisticGoal: Set a realistic goal amount to track your investment progress.
goalTracker.estimates8PercentReturn: Based on an estimated 8% annual return.

library.description: Click to add widgets to your dashboard
library.resetDashboardMessage: Reset dashboard to default layout? This will remove all your customizations and widgets.
library.widgetAlreadyExistsMessage: This widget is already on your dashboard. You can only add one instance of this widget type.

layouts.title: Layout Manager
layouts.description: Save, load, and share your dashboard layouts
layouts.noSavedLayoutsInfo: Save your current layout to get started.
layouts.proTipInfo: These are professionally designed layouts optimized for different investment styles. Click "Load" to apply any template.
layouts.importLayoutInfo: Select an exported layout JSON file to import a custom layout.

portfolios.description: Organize and manage your investment portfolios

charts.description: Track your portfolio value and visualize asset allocation
charts.heatmapDescription: Asset allocation by market value, colored by daily performance
charts.noPortfolioHistoryInfo: Historical data will be calculated from your saved price records and transactions.
charts.noPortfolioPerformanceInfo: Performance data will be calculated from your saved price records and transactions.

insights.title: Insights
insights.description: Analyze your investment performance and market trends
insights.diversificationDescription: Based on number of holdings and allocation spread.

transactions.title: Transactions
transactions.description: Track all your buy, sell, and dividend transactions
transactions.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this transaction? This action cannot be undone.
transactions.splitRatioInfo: Format: "N:M" where N is new shares and M is old shares. Examples: "2:1" (doubles shares), "3:1" (triples), "1:2" (reverse split halves shares)
transactions.autoFetchInfo: Leave empty to auto-fetch price in USD, or enter price in {{currency}}.

empty.noTransactionsInfo: Start by adding transactions to see them listed here.
empty.noTransactionMatchesInfo: Try searching with a different symbol or name, or
empty.noTransactionMatchesClear: clear your search to view all transactions.

splitHistory.title: Split History
splitHistory.splitsInfo: Splits automatically adjust share quantities and average costs in your portfolio.

empty.noSplitsInfo: Stock splits will appear here when recorded.

transactionMetrics.description: Analyze your buying and selling activity over time

empty.startAddingTransactions: Start adding transactions to see metrics here.

assets.description: Manage and analyze your held assets
assets.heldAndSoldAssetsAll: Held and sold assets across all portfolios
assets.heldAssetsAll: Currently held assets across all portfolios

empty.noAssetsMatchInfo: Try searching with a different symbol or name, or

empty.noBuySellTransactionsInfo: Buy and sell transactions will appear here when recorded.

assetMetadataEdit.about1: You can only set metadata when Yahoo Finance doesn't provide data
assetMetadataEdit.about5: This helps complete your distribution charts and insights
assetMetadataEdit.about6: If Yahoo Finance later adds data, your override will be ignored
assetMetadataEdit.cannotOverride: Cannot override - Yahoo Finance already provides this data
assetMetadataEdit.selectASector: Select a sector first to filter industries

watchlist.title: Watchlist
watchlist.description: Track assets you don't own yet, set alerts, and convert to investments.
watchlist.importDescription: Import your watchlist from a CSV file. Click the button below to select a file.
watchlist.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this asset from your watchlist? This action cannot be undone.

empty.noWatchlistAssets: No assets in your watchlist. Add assets to start tracking.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: Manage your account settings and preferences
profile.profileDescription: Update your personal details and account information.
profile.securityDescription: Manage your password and security settings.
profile.deleteDescription: This will permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.
profile.profileUpdatedEmailChanged: Profile updated. Please verify your new email address‚Äîverification email sent.
profile.failedToUpdateProfile: Failed to update profile. Please try again.
profile.newPasswordMinLength: New password must be at least 8 characters long.
profile.newPasswordMismatch: New password and confirmation do not match.
profile.failedToChangePassword: Failed to change password. Please try again.
profile.failedToSendVerification: Failed to send verification email. Please try again.
profile.failedToDeleteAccount: Failed to delete account. Please try again.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Configure your application preferences and settings
settings.autoRefreshSettingsDescription: Configure automatic price updates for your portfolio
settings.refreshIntervalWarning: Shorter intervals may increase API usage
settings.refreshIntervalNote: Auto-refresh can be toggled on/off from the Dashboard using the lightning bolt button. Prices will also refresh automatically when you switch back to the tab.
settings.dailyChangeNotificationsDescription: Get notified when your holdings experience significant daily price movements
settings.enableDailyChangeNotificationsInfo: Receive notifications when any of your holdings moves up or down significantly
settings.notificationThresholdInfo: Get notified when a holding's daily change exceeds this percentage (positive or negative)
settings.notificationThresholdNote: Continuously, the system checks your holdings for significant price changes. You'll receive notifications for both upside movements üìà (gains) and downside movements üìâ (losses) that exceed your threshold.
settings.transactionNotificationsDescription: Get notified about transaction activity in your portfolios
settings.enableTransactionNotificationsInfo: Receive notifications when transactions are added, edited, or deleted in your portfolios
settings.enableTransactionNotificationsNote: Transaction notifications help you track all portfolio activity, including new purchases, sales, dividends, and any modifications to existing transactions.
settings.dailyPortfolioReportsDescription: Receive a comprehensive daily PDF report of your portfolio performance
settings.enableDailyPortfolioReportsInfo: Get a beautiful PDF report emailed to you every weekday at 4 PM ET (after market close)
settings.enableDailyPortfolioReportsNote: Your daily report contains portfolio metrics, a visual heatmap of all positions, holdings with P&L, and transaction activity. Reports are sent Monday-Friday at 4:00 PM Eastern Time when markets close.
settings.validateSellQuantitiesDescription: When enabled, you cannot sell more shares than you currently own. Disable this for historical data imports or short selling.
settings.validateSellQuantitiesDescription1: Changes to this setting take effect immediately but are not persisted across server restarts. To make permanent changes, update the
settings.dangerZoneDescription: This will permanently delete all portfolios, transactions, prices, and assets. This action cannot be undone.
settings.projectDescription: A modern investment portfolio tracker built with FastAPI and React. Track your stocks, ETFs, and crypto with real-time pricing, P&L analytics, and beautiful charts.
settings.features2: Real-time price tracking via Yahoo Finance

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Stay updated with your portfolio activity
notifications.noUnreadNotificationsDescription: You're all caught up! Check back later for new notifications about your portfolio activity.
notifications.noNotificationsDescription: You have no notifications at the moment. Any important updates about your portfolio activity will appear here.

templates.dailyReportMessage: Your daily portfolio report for {{date}} has been sent to your email

admin.description: Manage application settings and monitor system status

admin.cannotDeletePrimaryAdmin: Cannot delete the primary admin account
admin.logFileEmptyOrNotFound: The log file may be empty or does not exist yet.
admin.emailSettingsDescription: Allow the application to send emails
admin.frontendNote: Used in email links to point back to the web application

login.description: Sign in to your Portfolium account

register.title: Create your account
register.subtitle: Start tracking your investments today
register.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
register.successMessageWithEmail: We've sent a verification email to {{email}}. Please check your inbox and click the verification link to activate your account.
register.successMessageNoEmail: Your account has been created successfully! You can now log in with your credentials.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot password?
forgotPassword.subtitle: No worries, we'll send you reset instructions
forgotPassword.successMessage: We've sent password reset instructions to {{email}}. Please check your inbox and follow the link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.expiryMessage: The reset link will expire in 1 hour.

resetPassword.title: Reset your password
resetPassword.subtitle: Enter your new password below
resetPassword.successMessage: Your password has been reset. You can now sign in with your new password.

verifyEmail.verifyingMessage: Please wait while we verify your email address.
verifyEmail.successMessage: Your email has been verified. You can now sign in to your account and start tracking your investments.
verifyEmail.redirecting: Redirecting to login page in 5 seconds...

verification.subject: Verify Your Email - Portfolium
verification.intro: Welcome to Portfolium! Please verify your email address by clicking the button below:
verification.alt_link_text: Or copy and paste this link into your browser:
verification.expiry_warning: ‚è∞ This verification link will expire in 24 hours.
verification.footer_text: If you didn't create an account with Portfolium, you can safely ignore this email.
verification.text_intro: Welcome to Portfolium! Please verify your email address by clicking the link below:
verification.text_expiry: This verification link will expire in 24 hours.
verification.text_footer: If you didn't create an account with Portfolium, you can safely ignore this email.

passwordReset.subject: Password Reset Request
passwordReset.intro: We received a request to reset your Portfolium account password. Click the button below to reset it:
passwordReset.alt_link_text: Or copy and paste this link into your browser:
passwordReset.expiry_warning: ‚è∞ This password reset link will expire in 1 hour.
passwordReset.security_text: If you didn't request a password reset, please ignore this email and ensure your account is secure.
passwordReset.text_intro: We received a request to reset your Portfolium account password. Click the link below to reset it:
passwordReset.text_expiry: This password reset link will expire in 1 hour.
passwordReset.text_security: If you didn't request a password reset, please ignore this email and ensure your account is secure.

welcome.subject: Welcome to Portfolium - Let's Get Started!
welcome.intro: Your email has been successfully verified! You now have full access to Portfolium.
welcome.help_text: If you have any questions or need help getting started, feel free to reach out!
welcome.text_intro: Your email has been successfully verified! You now have full access to Portfolium.
welcome.text_help: If you have any questions or need help getting started, feel free to reach out!

dashboard.title: No Portfolio Yet
dashboard.message: Get started by creating your first portfolio to track your investments and analyze performance.

insights.title: No Portfolio Selected
insights.message: Create or select a portfolio to view detailed insights, performance metrics, and analytics.

transactions.title: No Portfolio to Track
transactions.message: Create a portfolio first to start tracking your buy, sell, and dividend transactions.

assets.title: No Assets to Display
assets.message: Create a portfolio and add transactions to see your assets and their distribution.

watchlist.title: Watchlist Ready
watchlist.message: While you can add assets to your watchlist, creating a portfolio will let you convert them into actual investments.

charts.title: No Data to Visualize
charts.message: Create a portfolio and add transactions to visualize your investment performance over time.

emptyPortfolio.gettingStartedMessage: A portfolio is a container for your investments. You can create multiple portfolios to organize different investment strategies.

assets.title: No Assets to Display
assets.message: Add your first transaction to {{portfolio}} to start tracking your investments and see your asset allocation.
assets.secondaryMessage: Once you add transactions, you'll see your holdings, market values, profit/loss, and asset distribution.

insights.title: No Data for Insights Yet
insights.message: Start adding transactions to {{portfolio}} to unlock detailed insights, performance metrics, and analytics.
insights.secondaryMessage: Portfolio insights include performance metrics, risk analysis, sector allocation, and benchmark comparisons.

charts.title: No Performance Data
charts.message: Add transactions to {{portfolio}} to visualize your investment performance over time with charts and graphs.
charts.secondaryMessage: Interactive charts will show your portfolio value over time, daily changes, and performance trends.

metrics.title: No Transaction Metrics Yet
metrics.message: Add transactions to {{portfolio}} to analyze your buying and selling activity over time.
metrics.secondaryMessage: View detailed breakdowns of purchases vs. sales, average transaction sizes, fees, and activity patterns by month or year.

emptyTransactions.step1: Click "Add Your First Transaction" or go to the Transactions page
emptyTransactions.step2: Search for a stock or ETF ticker (e.g., AAPL, MSFT, SPY)
emptyTransactions.step3: Enter the quantity, price, and date of your purchase
emptyTransactions.step4: Watch your portfolio come to life with real-time data!
emptyTransactions.proTipMessage: Already tracking your portfolio elsewhere? Use the CSV import feature on the Transactions page to quickly add all your holdings at once.
